messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: toys
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/5/00 9:14:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time, RNorell@msn.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/5/00 9:14:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time, RNorell@...
writes:

<< But alas, with 4 sets of grandparents, and 9 sets of aunts and uncles, my
kids STILL have too much stuff!
>>
We do too. I hardley ever buy the little ones toys, and our place is still
overflowing with them. The funny thing is, my 14 month old would rather play
with a string than any toys. This year we are putting together a Christmas
wish list for everyone. At the top of the list, we are saying we would
prefer "no toys that require batteries" and lots of books. Although, we are
overflowing with those too. My thoughts are, you can never have tooooo many
books.....hee hee hee

Julie
